title: CHARACTER MOVEMENT VISUAL BUG
body:
i was playing this afternoon and the game seems to have a bug. my champion cannot consistently move as my cursor pointed. the route is fine but not the pathway suck as the visual effect.. like it says otherwise. my champion seems to move left and right and ended up at the location i right clicked. ive check my graphic cards and stuff, it works perfectly well for other games. only league has the problem, so plz find out and fix it. 

**thanks**
